title: Deliciously Dangerous
description: UNDER-THE-COVERS SEDUCTION! Undercover agent Callie Carpenter is closing in on her elusive target, but she needs one man: her targeti 1/2s right-hand guy and (coincidentally!) really hot stuff. Callie cani 1/2t resist. And she woni 1/2t! The man Calliei 1/2s dealing with is sexy-as-hell, ruthless and has his own agenda. So inevitably, the sensual games i 1/2 involving good wine, good food and great sex i 1/2 must come to an end. Her mission is an undercover seduction...with a delicious side of danger!"
author: Karen Anders
